member.name: T:myCSharpPracticeProjects.Palindrome
member.summary: this code will accept a string from the terminal and checks wether it it reads the same backward as forward. It ignores any special character or white spaces.

member.name: M:myCSharpPracticeProjects.Palindrome.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: main method to execute the palindrom logic.
member.param: an array of strings reading from the terminal
